settings.heading: Introducing Spectrum Essentials
settings.text: Spectrum Boutique’s team of sex toy experts and sex educators has created a collection of our very own sex toys: Spectrum Essentials! These sex toys have been hand-picked with pleasure and function in mind, made from lab-tested materials that are phthalate-free and body-safe. We’ve tested, tweaked, and reworked each of these sex toys to give you a range of functions, vibrations, and uses to bring you toybox staples in classic and versatile shapes. And we’ve focused on making these high-quality sex toys available at more affordable prices - because fun, safe toys shouldn’t break the bank.

settings.heading: Spectrum Essentials G-Spot Vibe
settings.text: This classic g-spot vibrator is the first in the Spectrum Essentials sex toy collection. The Spectrum Essentials G-Spot Vibe has a curved, bulbous tip that's flexible enough to conform to the body's curves so you can find exactly the right spot. This silicone vibrator is non-porous and easy to clean and features 5 powerful and rumbly vibration intensities and 7 patterns. The Spectrum Essentials G-Spot Vibe is rechargeable, waterproof, and has a one-year warranty. All the features of a luxury sex toy at a fraction of the price!

settings.heading: Spectrum Essentials Compact Vibe
settings.text: The Spectrum Essentials Compact Vibrator is a flexible, palm-sized, thin, and ergonomic external silicone vibrator with variable rumbly vibrations. This body-friendly and budget-friendly vibrator fits comfortably between two bodies so you can incorporate it into partner play or use it on your own!

settings.heading: Spectrum Essentials Rechargeable Sweet Spot Dual-Action Anal Vibrator
settings.text: Get all-around anal stimulation with the Spectrum Essentials Sweet Spot Anal Vibe. Designed for backdoor play, this dual-action vibe stimulates your p-spot or g-spot while vibrating on your taint. It's not just a butt toy, though. Explore front hole play with the Sweet Spot as well! Hygienic, body-friendly, and affordable. Check it out today!
